channel.author: Wanja Muhoro
channel.description:
Kenyan girl chronicles is about self-growth, self-love, self-care and all about self!
It is about experiences, interviews and stories that matter to everybody.....
Enjoy the podcast as it’s made out of love, life and laughter 
All the rollercoasters of life are welcomed!

item.dc:creator: Wanja Muhoro
item.description: In this episode, I dive deep into the empowering world of body positivity. Beauty is all about perception, and I'm here to explore how you can transform the way you view yourself. I'll discuss common triggers that can lead to negative thoughts about your body, shedding light on how societal pressures, media, and personal experiences can influence our self-image. But it's not all about identifying the triggers; we're all about solutions! The episode is packed with practical tips and strategies to reclaim your self-esteem when you find yourself spiraling into a negative headspace about your body. It's time to unleash your inner body positivity and embrace your unique beauty. Hit that subscribe button, and let's embark on this transformative adventure together!
item.itunes:summary: In this episode, I dive deep into the empowering world of body positivity. But it's not all about identifying the triggers; we're all about solutions! The episode is packed with practical tips and strategies to reclaim your self-esteem when you find yourself spiraling into a negative headspace about your body. It's time to unleash your inner body positivity and embrace your unique beauty. Hit that subscribe button, and let's embark on this transformative adventure together!
item.title: Body Positivity Unleashed| Redefining Beauty| It is all about Perception

item.dc:creator: Wanja Muhoro
item.description: Join me in this insightful episode as I delve into the world of adult friendships. Discover the importance of giving ourselves and our friends grace as we navigate the complexities of grown-up relationships. Learn how understanding, patience, and empathy can strengthen the bonds that sustain us through life's ever-changing journey.
item.itunes:summary: Join me in this insightful episode as I delve into the world of adult friendships. Discover the importance of giving ourselves and our friends grace as we navigate the complexities of grown-up relationships. Learn how understanding, patience, and empathy can strengthen the bonds that sustain us through life's ever-changing journey.
item.title: Navigating Adult friendship | The Power of Grace

item.dc:creator: Wanja Muhoro
item.description: In this insightful episode, we delve deep into the world of Imposter Syndrome, uncovering its definition, distinguishing it from legitimate concerns, and sharing powerful strategies to conquer it. Imposter Syndrome Explained: Discover what Imposter Syndrome truly is and how it can manifest in your life. We break down the psychological aspects behind feeling like a fraud, even when you're not. Legitimate Concerns vs. Imposter Syndrome: Learn to differentiate between genuine areas of improvement and the unfounded self-doubt that characterizes Imposter Syndrome. Gain the clarity to channel your energy where it matters most. Strategies for Success: Our expert guests share proven techniques to boost confidence, build self-esteem, and overcome Imposter Syndrome. You'll leave with actionable steps to embrace your true potential. Don't let Imposter Syndrome hold you back any longer. Join me in this transformative discussion, and take the first step toward becoming the best version of yourself. Subscribe for more empowering content and hit the notification bell so you never miss an episode. Let's conquer Imposter Syndrome together!

item.title: What is Imposter syndrome and How do you overcome it?

item.dc:creator: Wanja Muhoro
item.description: Welcome to a transformative episode on our channel! Dive deep into the intriguing world of avoidance and procrastination as we uncover their meanings and empower you with game-changing strategies to overcome these hurdles.🕒💡 Say goodbye to delay and distraction, and hello to a more productive and focused you. Don't miss out on this essential guide to reclaiming your time and achieving your goals. Tune in now and unlock your full potential!

item.title: Avoidance & Procrastination | Strategies on How to Triumph over Avoidance & Procrastination

item.dc:creator: Wanja Muhoro
item.description: Ever pondered the secret behind individuals who maintain a positive outlook, even during their toughest times? Join me in this episode where we delve into the advantages of nurturing a positive mindset and embracing the small joys in your everyday experiences. Additionally, I'll unveil three techniques I personally employ to uphold a positive mentality and cultivate ongoing gratitude in my daily routine. Tune in to enhance your self-development journey in the realms of positivity and appreciation.

item.title: Gratitude & Positive Thinking | Incredible Benefits of a Positive Mindset and Practicing Gratitude

item.dc:creator: Wanja Muhoro
item.description: In this episode, I'm introducing a KGC series where I give my two cents about trending stories in social media and giving you an opportunity to engage and say your piece😊! In today's episode, I will be talking about a story that has been trending for a couple of days where a young girl broke her virginity and ended up contracting Herpes and HIV. Let me know what y'all think about this story @kgcpodcast on Instagram.

item.dc:creator: Wanja Muhoro
item.description: I am so happy to be releasing the third season of Kenyan Girl Chronicles! Thank you for the support! In this episode I will be talking about scenarios from a couple of tv shows and talking about how we should remember to love ourselves correctly so no one will love you the wrong way and accept it.

In this episode I will be talking about scenarios from a couple of tv shows and talking about how we should remember to love ourselves correctly so no one will love you the wrong way and accept it.
item.title: Loving you right!

item.description: In this episode, we are answering the question: Is it your partner’s responsibility to know your needs and wants or should it be you to communicate it to them? Let me know your opinion by messaging me @kenyangirlchronicles on Instagram

item.description: In this short episode, I will read you the well known poem by Maya Angeleo “Still I Rise”. The aim of this episode is to allow you to interpret the poem in your own words and how it lifts you up as a woman. Enjoy😘♥️

item.description: It’s valentines and most of us are thinking where our significant other or loved one is going to take us (or where we will take them). My question to you is… have you thought of taking yourself out and shower yourself with humongous love♥️😻. Enjoy the episode and don’t forget to rate subscribe and like the episode☺️

item.dc:creator: Wanja Muhoro
item.description: In this episode, I get to share how my phone decided to find another owner😭😅 and how I was in shock maybe still is up to date😟. This episode is funny and sad at the same time, but we still emerged great🥰. Enjoy listening to this episode as it was recorded with love and laughter... daaahh😉. Do not forget to follow me @wanja_muhoro in Instagram. Byyyeeeee👋🏽
